verbs.description: Op - ed : Trump administration policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] is a form of torture that must end .
Op - ed : [ARG1: Trump administration policy of separating immigrant children from their parents at the border] [V: is] [ARG2: a form of torture that must end] .
Op - ed : Trump administration policy of separating immigrant children from their parents at the border is a form of torture that [V: must] end .
Op - ed : Trump administration policy of separating immigrant children from their parents at the border is [ARG1: a form of torture] [R-ARG1: that] [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: end] .
